choices.answer: a comparison between two things
a comparison using the word 'like'
a comparison of two things using the word 'like' or 'as'
when a writing says that one thing is really something else

questions.question: Which sentence below contains a simile ?

choices.answer: The students were so noisy, I couldn't hear anything.
The students were way too loud this afternoon.
The students were as noisy as a jet engine.
The students were causing quite a ruckus after recess!

questions.question: Which sentence below contains a metaphor?

choices.answer: Mrs. White's students are really studious.
Mrs. White's students are super smart.
Mrs. White's students are restless, so they went outside..
Mrs. White's students are walking encyclopedias.

questions.question: Which sentence below is an example of a metaphor ?

choices.answer: Her sister is a fish in the water.
Her sister likes to swim all day.
Her sister is a great swimmer, and so am I!
Her sister is learning to swim this summer.

questions.question: Which sentence below is an example of a simile?

choices.answer: The child was eager to open the gifts under the tree.
The child was like an octopus, grabbing at all the presents!
The child stared with excitement at the presents.
The child couldn't believe what Santa brought for Christmas.

questions.question: Which sentence below is an example of a simile?

choices.answer: She likes hot chocolate and marshmallows.
She acts like my mom sometimes.
She is like a pretty flower .
She likes me.

questions.question: What statement is true about the picture shown below ?

choices.answer: Both people are using similes
Both people  are using metaphors
both characters are Cowboy fans
One person is using a simile. The other is using a metaphor

questions.question: The song lyrics below are an example of a ___________________ .

choices.answer: metaphor
simile
both
neither
The grinch is cuddly.
The grinch is spiky
No one would want to cuddle with the grinch.
The grinch is green .

questions.question: Which line below has a simile ?

choices.answer: My power flurries through the air into the ground.
My soul is spiraling in frozen fractals all around.
And one thought crystallizes like an icy blast.
I'm never going back. The past is in the past.
